page.title: 17Travel in Laggan
page.content: Our nearest airport is 60 miles away at Dalcross Inverness.Our nearest working station is Kingussie 12 miles away although a few trains do still stop at Newtonmore.To reach these a car or bus is necessary and here the Laggan dweller has a problem.Without a car driver our only method of leaving Laggan is by school bus (not on Saturdays) or since 1975 a post bus (which stopped this year). The school bus only operates as far as Kingussie and only during term time.The post bus is dependant on train arrivals bringing mail and is therefore late in winter.When the traveller manages to leave Laggan the infrequency of trains both North & South can be an added problem.Thus having our own shop and village hall and self sufficient skills are very important.
